steps.title: We're the cookies
steps.message: We waited to make sure that you were interested in the content of this website before bothering you, but we would love to be your companions during your visit...

steps.title: Analytics & Stats
steps.subTitle: Measuring calories is key
steps.message: In order to improve your experience, we need to count and measure events on this website, what page you view, how long you stay on the content, etc.

vendors.longDescription: Allows to track the visitor's actions on the website, and see if thereâ€™s any conversions

vendors.title: Facebook Pixel

vendors.longDescription: Essential for managing our website, it allows us to measure indicators such as traffic, the most consulted products, or even the geographical distribution of visitors.
